name: DoomSpace3
description:
https://youtu.be/97e--1wCFx0
New HOLHO Holographic 3D map!
Homemade HOLHO VR Cardboard. Enjoy the Augmented Reality! HOLHO Holographic 3D map now!
Please contact us by e-mail how to make HOLHO 3D VR cardboard!
DoomSpace3 is a shooter designed for the HOLHO 3D VR Cardboard and other Augmented Virtual Reality viewers for iOS devices. It's also playable without any special viewer (just tap to switch modes).
